attributes.action: Economic Plan for The Future Equality and Emancipation of all
attributes.additional_details: The economic plan is that in a town/city or village everyone pays a pound a day (£30 A month). So say you have 17,000 people living in an area you will gain £17,000 a day, or £85,000 a week, so that money can be used to fund for the community, be used for interest free loans to the poor of society. The money can also be used to fund for schools, bus passes for the elderly, disabled and for children and students.
